Caption: Prof. K.T. Chandy (Chairman, Board of Governors) delivers the Convocation address. On the dias, from left: Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai (Director), Mrs. Indira Gandhi (Prime Minister of India and Chief Guest), Mr. K.K. Sha (Governor of Tamil Nadu), Mr. C. Subramaniam (Union Minister) and Prof. S. Sampath
